name: Chrono Divergence
description:
Play as F.R.E.D., a small roboter send on a mission by humanity.
Discover which choices could lead them to a thriving future instead of a dystopian nightmare. Solve puzzles and collect information in different timelines to archive this goal.

Learn about sustainability and environment in this fun, but educational puzzle game.

Please consider to give us feedback by completing this questionnaire.
